Actully, I'm getting tired of this RPG

::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    =
Wolveritron got hit by the foot. He swung his claws on his left hand out at=
 the raptor, aiming for the next. His right hand claws swung for the guys g=
ut.
    Eclipse went around to the back out the bot, and started to claw at=
 his back. Ramus used his arm blades and started to claw at his right side.=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 11:03 AM
  Subject: is that the=
 best you got?


  12 blasts from three sides huh. bad move for the ones on=
 the left and right. OK hows this?

  Razor Claw forced his way forward get=
ting pummeled by the majority of the shots. He lept upward causing some of =
the shots from the side to head toward the opposite bot. The bleeding rapto=
r worked his way close enough to Wolveritron where future shots could hit e=
ither one. he slashed at the bot with his clawed feat. "Fight for yourself =
coward your friends will have more than enough opportunities to die later, =
nows your turn. Do you here the Matrix calling you home?" The beast had los=
t it's mind or it would have thought to hold still and use his forcefield i=
nstead of getting beat upon in a three on one fight.

  (Come on Dachande y=
ou afraid of a little scratch?)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From=
: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday, February 2=
1, 2001 9:16 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande did you forget?


    I must have=
.

    ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

        They all fired their weapons =
at the raptor, and the were to the front of him, the left and the right. Ea=
ch 4 times.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
   =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 11:=
54 AM
      Subject: Fw: Dachande did you forget?


      heres the last po=
st I have for the fight between Razor Claw and Wolveritron.
      ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
      Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 7:31 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachan=
de respond or else


      Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with ha=
te in his eyes and drool dripping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had co=
ntrol of his actions and wouldn't be stopped until justice had been served.=
 "You fear me." He states through a half closed mouth. 

      He looked ba=
ck at his origional prey, "You fear me so much that you will not fight one =
on one." He took a few steps forward lowering his head to the level of Wolv=
eritron so they could look eye to eye. The anger and hatred split the air a=
s the two looked toward each other. The teeth of one and the claws of the a=
cused reflected in the light around. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if =
Razor Claw had his way the Wolverine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


 =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: dachande 
        To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 6:30 AM
     =
   Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


        ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ra=
mus::

            "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Because you t=
icked me off."
            Eclipse transformed to his full out battle mode,=
 standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full length, 5 inc=
hes. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on them.
 =
           Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
       =
     "We're ready for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, t=
hough.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, February 11, =
2001 9:38 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


          Ra=
zor Claw rolled out the busted windshield using the tuck and roll technique=
 to avoid excessive damage. 

          "You decide to fight after all I se=
e." the raptor yells in his rage. he charges forward biting at Wolveritron.=
 "You fight me now, after leaving your team to fight alone? I will kill you=
 slowly."


            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: dac=
hande 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, =
February 10, 2001 7:47 AM
            Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else=



            He is.

            ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::

         =
       His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight =
for me, Bub?"
                "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse=
 said, putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to hi=
m."
                "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
    =
            Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). =
"I have no problem giving him what he wants."
                He didn't fir=
e though.

ct to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 



    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is sub=
ject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
    =
   
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of =
Service.
